Action.author: jtonline
Action.body: Probably worth checking what works in the other SDKs before updating the read the doc docs. They should all accept the same format?

Action.author: jtonline
Action.body: It looks like both formats are in use- the peer chaincode command works with the example in the read the docs doc, but fails with the example from the node sdkÂ https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/release-1.4/commands/peerchaincode.html

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: Both formats are used, the policy must be defined differently based on using the CLI or NodeSDK to package the Chaincode.

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: Both documents are correct for the where they are used.
